com.noctarius.borabora.builder

Interface ParserBuilder


  • public interface ParserBuilder
    The ParserBuilder class is used to configure a new Parser instance. Configuration options include TagStrategys, QueryOptimizers, available ProjectionStrategys and other factories to create the query pipeline.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ParserBuilder addQueryOptimizer(QueryOptimizer queryOptimizer)
      Adds the given QueryOptimizer instance to the new Parser configuration.
      ParserBuilder addQueryOptimizers(Iterable<QueryOptimizer> queryOptimizers)
      Adds the given QueryOptimizer instances to the new Parser configuration.
      ParserBuilder addQueryOptimizers(QueryOptimizer queryOptimizer1, QueryOptimizer queryOptimizer2)
      Adds the given QueryOptimizer instances to the new Parser configuration.
      ParserBuilder addQueryOptimizers(QueryOptimizer queryOptimizer1, QueryOptimizer queryOptimizer2, QueryOptimizer... queryOptimizers)
      Adds the given QueryOptimizer instances to the new Parser configuration.
      ParserBuilder addTagStrategies(Iterable<TagStrategy> tagStrategies)
      Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Parser configuration.
      ParserBuilder addTagStrategies(TagStrategy tagStrategy1, TagStrategy tagStrategy2)
      Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Parser configuration.
      ParserBuilder addTagStrategies(TagStrategy tagStrategy1, TagStrategy tagStrategy2, TagStrategy... tagStrategies)
      Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Parser configuration.
      ParserBuilder addTagStrategy(TagStrategy tagStrategy)
      Adds the given TagStrategy instance to the new Parser configuration.
      ParserBuilder asBinaryProjectionStrategy()
      Configures the Parser configuration to use a binary ProjectionStrategy.
      ParserBuilder asObjectProjectionStrategy()
      Configures the Parser configuration to use a object ProjectionStrategy.
      Parser build()
      Returns a new Parser instance based on the internal configuration.
      ParserBuilder withPipelineStageFactory(PipelineStageFactory pipelineStageFactory)
      Configures the Parser configuration to use the given PipelineStageFactory to create non-standard PipelineStages.
      ParserBuilder withProjectionStrategy(ProjectionStrategy projectionStrategy)
      Configures the Parser configuration to use the given ProjectionStrategy to use a non-standard strategy.
      ParserBuilder withQueryContextFactory(QueryContextFactory queryContextFactory)
      Configures the Parser configuration to use the given QueryContextFactory to create a non-standard QueryContext.
      ParserBuilder withQueryOptimizerStrategyFactory(QueryOptimizerStrategyFactory queryOptimizerStrategyFactory)
      Configures the Parser configuration to use the given QueryOptimizerStrategyFactory to create a non-standard QueryOptimizerStrategy
      ParserBuilder withQueryPipelineFactory(QueryPipelineFactory queryPipelineFactory)
      Configures the Parser configuration to use the given QueryPipelineFactory to create a non-standard QueryPipeline.

        ParserBuilder addTagStrategy(TagStrategy tagStrategy)
        Adds the given TagStrategy instance to the new Parser configuration.
        Parameters:
        tagStrategy - the TagStrategy to add to the configuration
        Returns:
        this builder instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if tagStrategy is null

                               TagStrategy tagStrategy2)

        tagStrategy1 - the first TagStrategy to add to the configuration
        tagStrategy2 - the second TagStrategy to add to the configuration
        Returns:
        this builder instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either tagStrategy instance is null

        tagStrategy2 - the second TagStrategy to add to the configuration

        Returns:
        this builder instance

      • build

        Parser build()
        Returns a new Parser instance based on the internal configuration. The returned parser is fully thread-safe and stateless and can be stored and shared by multiple threads.
        Returns:
        the new Parser instance
